name: Screams in Tempo
description:
Get a masterclass in classical music from an unexpected source - Munch's screaming man, who is an avid singer and a music buff. He will take you through various different hallmarks of classical music in increasingly difficult classes - will you be able to keep up?

Controls:

All keybinds are changeable in the settings menu, by default the key for each lane of notes is QWER (from left to right). Escape to pause

Credits:
  • Afonso Ormonde
  • Joana Gonçalves
  • Maria Gomes
  • Nuno Ramos

Made in association with GameDev Técnico. Check out our website, itch.io, facebook.
